name: Milk Dungeon
description:
Ludum dare 46 game attempt. Theme: Keep it alive

Your boss asked you to babysit for him. Little did you know, it was a much bigger job than you were expecting.

play in browser or download

Controls:
wasd - movement
e - hit/interact
q - throw away item

Notes:
Hammer required to repair pipes
Mop required to clean spills

CHEATS: (you can force win/lose to see the endings)
press g to open cheat/debug menu
